data.text: @Sharonsmall56 @CityNewsKIT Pharmacies in the U.S. aren't offering the cheaper rapid antigen tests, so the new rules aren't at all helpful. It's sad when it's so difficult to return to your own country.
@AshMill35741031 @CityNewsKIT Oh god.  You're so dumb.  Literally no clue.   Have a good day.
@comsensemonster @CityNewsKIT Not a bot lol!  It’s not bc Canada won’t let you cross, it’s bc the other countries won’t let you in 😂 might not be able to fly, but can absolutely leave, and return!
@Doggydogg2468 @AshMill35741031 @CityNewsKIT Me too.  😉...    I'm basically a murderer!
@comsensemonster @AshMill35741031 @CityNewsKIT Oh the usual, meeting friends at restaurants and visiting relatives across the border. https://t.co/mFiLprroEC
@Sharonsmall56 @CityNewsKIT Are coming back in to Canada through Michigan or flying direct from Idaho to Canada?

🤡
